== Description ==
Callback function for [http://us2.php.net/manual/en/function.ob-start.php <tt>ob_start()</tt>] to capture all links in the theme. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php preview_theme_ob_filter( $content ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$content|string|}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) :
